bean.description: This bean provides basic information (name, version) about the application to all the other beans. The properties of this bean should never be changed but the developers. This bean should implement interface org.esupportail.commons.services.application.ApplicationService.

property.name: versionMajorNumber
property.description: The major number of the application (1 for version 1.2.3).

property.name: versionMinorNumber
property.description: The minor number of the application (2 for version 1.2.3).

property.name: versionUpdate
property.description: The update of the application (3 for version 1.2.3).

property.name: latestVersionBaseUrl
property.description: The base URL where the latest version number should be found.
